name: Adtoniq Express
author: Adtoniq

sections.description:
Create New Ad Revenue In Minutes

Introducing a consent-based ad network exclusively for engaging ad blocking audiences. With One Click Consent you pay nothing, make money, and we do the work!

The Problem

Ad blocker usage is at an all-time high. This causes a variety of difficulties for websites (even ones that don’t depend on selling ads).

The Solution

We’ve made it simple. Our technology allows ad block users to opt-in to advertising and other services with our proprietary One-click Consent, engaging them via high quality, open and transparent messaging and serving ads.

An Optimized Experience

We implement continuous multi-variate testing to optimize messaging, communication and ad placement strategies on your site(s) to maximize conversions using one-click consent technology

Accurate Ad Blocking Measurement

Utilize our technology for ad blocking analytics even if you don’t want ads or messaging on your site.

Optimized

We constantly build out our proprietary technology, strategy and partnerships to maximize your revenue.

New Revenue

We pay you and retain a small percentage from the revenue we have created.

We Play Nice

We work alongside other technology and do not take away from any other revenue streams.

Teammates

We are 100% aligned with our partners – if you are not making money, we aren’t either.

Automated Updating

On-Call Customer Support and Consultation Services

Contact Adtoniq at: support@adtoniq.com or 415.340.1949.
sections.installation:
1. Install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly, or upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->Plugin Adtoniq screen to enter your API key which you get from Adtoniq
sections.faq:
How much does Adtoniq cost?

Adtoniq costs nothing but a little bit of your time to get started. Set up time can be as little as 5 minutes.

How do I get started?

Contact Adtoniq at support@adtoniq.com to request an API key
Install the plugin
Approve the preview that Adtoniq prepares for you
Sit back and receive checks from Adtoniq

Is Adtoniq right for me?

Do you serve ads on your WordPress website(s)? Then ad blockers are preventing you from making more money. Adtoniq solves that problem. Adtoniq also serves as a reliable technology for ad blocking analytics.
sections.changelog:
5.0.0.15

  • Updated this readme file with more information.

5.0.1.1

  • Some JS which was included out-of-line by the plugin is blocked by some ad blockers. This release moves that JS inline. Support for older plugins with out-of-line JS is also provided.
  • Fixed bug in readme.txt which was hopefully due to an invalid character. Oddly, the earlier readme passed the WordPress readme validator. Maybe that needs to be upgraded?

5.0.1.2

  • Also took CSS inline so it won’t get blocked

5.0.1.3

Tested plugin on WordPress versions up to WordPress version 5.2.1

5.0.1.4

Remove iframe used for ad block detection as that is no longer used

5.0.1.9

  • Tested with WordPress version 5.6.1
  • Removed old code no longer needed
  • Add debug capability to set Adtoniq integration server (default disabled)

short_description: Maximize the value of your ad blocked audience.
